#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ll n;
	cin>>n;
	map<ll, ll> m;
	ll tot=0,i,k;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>k;
		m[k]++;
	}
	tot = (n*(n-1))/2;
	map<ll, ll>::iterator it = m.begin();
	while(it!=m.end()){
		tot -= (*it).second * ((*it).second - 1 )/2;
		it++;
	}
	cout<<tot<<endl;
}
